answers.answer: I'm unsure if you are asking what would diagnose you with diabetes or if you are a diabetic who wants to know what her target blood sugars should be. For diagnosis: Fasting blood sugars 100-125 are considered pre-diabetes, 126 and over are diabetic. For A1C: 5.7-6.4 is pre-diabetes and 6.5 and over is diabetes.If you are diabetic you want to see if you can keep your fasting under 100 and your two hour post-prandials under 140.
